price: 7 assistant aux persécutions infligées aux croyants
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
